title: Understanding the Problem
text: To predict one value from another using a linear relationship, we need to identify a statistical technique that models the relationship between two variables. This technique should allow us to make predictions based on the linear association between these variables.

title: Exploring Options
text: Consider the following options: Hypothesis testing, Correlation, Regression, and Chi-square. Which of these techniques is specifically designed to predict one variable based on another using a linear relationship?

title: Identifying the Correct Technique
text: The correct answer involves finding the best-fitting line that represents the trend in the data and makes predictions. Which option is this?
